translated: The Team Portugal Football (Selecção Portuguesa de Futebol in Portuguese) is the national football team of Portugal, she was ranked third worldwide by FIFA in May 2010.
original: L'Équipe du Portugal de football (Selecção Portuguesa de Futebol, en portugais), est l'équipe de football nationale du Portugal, elle était classée 3e mondiale par la FIFA en mai 2010.
